title: World leaders adopt a historic global declaration on noncommunicable diseases and mental health
summary: Leaders from across the world at the Eightieth United Nations General Assembly (UNGA) have adopted the political declaration to combat noncommunicable diseases (NCDs) and mental health challenges through a fully integrated approach.
